```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE, results= "hide"}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
source(here("_workflow/common.R"))

path <- "/home/shares/food-systems/Food_footprint/all_food_systems/analysis/_map_checks/"
```


Not logged
```{r, results = "asis"}

png_list <- list.files(paste(path, "not_logged", sep = ""), full = TRUE, pattern = ".png")
png_list <- grep("_water", png_list, value=TRUE, invert=FALSE)


for(png in png_list) {
  
  #png <- png_list[1]
  
    cat(paste0("![](", png, ")"), "\n")
  
    cat("\n\n\\pagebreak\n")
    
}
```
